param.span: Die Protokoll-ID des zu beendenden Listenerchannels.

span.span: The protocol ID of the listener channel to stop.

param.name: immediate
param.span: , um den Prozessprotokoll-Manager zu benachrichtigen, dass alle Listenerchannels synchron beendet werden sollen. , um alle Listenerchannels asynchron zu beenden.

span.span: to notify the process protocol manager to stop all listener channels synchronously; to stop all listener channels asynchronously.
